entries.title: Beautiful Day
entries.content: The weather was perfect today. I went for a long walk in the park.

entries.title: Learning JavaScript
entries.content: Spent the day practicing JavaScript. I'm getting better at it!

entries.title: Weekend Plans
entries.content: Making plans for the weekend. Maybe I'll visit my friends.

entries.title: Rainy Day
entries.content: It rained all day. Stayed inside and read a book.
